I

increasePopulation(int) - Method in class javolver.Javolver
Add a number of randomly initialized genes to the population, until it reaches specified size.
Individual - Class in javolver
This is the base class that should be used to create custom individual types to feed into the evolver.
Individual provides a simple array of floats to represent the 'DNA' of the individual,
these floats can be mapped by the user to any data type they require.
Individual() - Constructor for class javolver.Individual
Default constructor.
init(int) - Method in class javolver.Chromosome
Init data to specified size with random values in the range 0..1

Javolver - Class in javolver
Javolver is a simple engine that processes a pool of individuals using genetic selection.
